definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to start (a machine)/(fig.) to set in motion/to launch (an operation)/to activate (a plan)
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)

sentences.english: His knee is misshapen or unequipped to move.
sentences.chinese: 他的膝蓋有點正常，也不能動。

sentences.english: Song of XuSong taste carefully, not as one of the move.
sentences.chinese: 仔細品味許嵩的歌，不免爲之一動。

sentences.english: The farmland great body didn't move and just seeing at Helen chillily.
sentences.chinese: 田宏的身體沒有動，只是冷冷的看着海倫。

sentences.english: The Wang Shi lip Yi moved several bottoms, didn't talk, but the facial expression is aggrieved.
sentences.chinese: 王氏嘴脣翳動了幾下，沒有說話，臉色卻忿忿不平。

sentences.english: A girl passed close to him, and Lieutenant Blandford started.
sentences.chinese: 一個女孩靠近他走過，布蘭佛德中尉喫驚地動了一下。

sentences.english: Just change one or two words and the sentence will read smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 這句話只要動一兩個字就順了。

sentences.english: The mule was frightened and ran away, kicking wildly.
sentences.chinese: 騾子驚恐不已，瘋狂地踢動着跑開。

sentences.english: Then, sometimes, the door slowly opens and gapes _ for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 有時房門會慢慢打開，敞着不動。

sentences.english: He asked the doctor how long it had taken him to finish the operation.
sentences.chinese: 他問醫生動這個手術花了多長時間？

sentences.english: It was calm and not a leaf moved .
sentences.chinese: 平靜得連一片葉子也沒有動。

sentences.english: I heard from God sis that she can now feel her baby moving and kicking.
sentences.chinese: 聽到誼姐冠秀說她已經可以感覺到她寶寶在踢動了。

sentences.english: The guests left most of the dishes untouched, because they didn't taste delicious.
sentences.chinese: 客人們沒有動大部分菜，因爲它們嚐起來味道不咋樣。

sentences.english: The frightening noise made the girl too frightened to move.
sentences.chinese: 這個可怕的聲音令女孩感到非常害怕，以致不敢動。

sentences.english: Do not derange the bridle hand.
sentences.chinese: 注意握繮繩的手不要動。

sentences.english: VRC is a syntax structure consists of a verb and its resultative complement.
sentences.chinese: 動結式”是指動詞帶表示結果的補語組成的句法結構。

sentences.english: Do not be swayed by those who enter lower vibratory realms.
sentences.chinese: 不要爲那些進入低振動領域的人們所動。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
